main event: Radar tracing of unidentified objects in Raleigh, North Carolina, in September 1961.
interesting points: The observation was reported on 17 September 1961 at 11:00 PM., Radar data indicated objects conforming to balloons., The individual was in a car on U.S. Route 1 when the object was observed., The object descended rapidly with tremendous vertical speed., The witness described the object as silent and unlike normal aircraft.
witness description: A person driving on U.S. Route 1 who is familiar with normal aircraft activity in the area.
